JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Mechanic needed for machine reperation in Egtved
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Jobbeskrivelse

You will be responsible for maintenance and reparation of construction machinery. You will receive faulty machines and your job will be to fix these. In addition, you will, at the same time, be allowed to work with other occuring work assignments; many of these related to warehouse work.

You will be part of a team of 6 people with a casual social dynamic.

Arbejdsopgaver

  • Repair and maintenance of machines
  • Maintenance of warehouse and production
  • Various cleaning tasks
  • Other administrative tasks - including reception of goods

Faglige Kvalifikationer

Previous experience is an advantage. You do not need to have worked with it for many years, but you need to have knowledge and understanding of machines and mechanical skills in terms of experience.

You will go through a thorough training course at start-up, so it is not expected that you should be an expert from day 1.

Personlige Kvalifikationer

  • Drive and willingness to learn
  • Good at working independently
  • Speaking Danish is not a requirement - as long as you can communicate in english at a decent level

Særlige Forhold

Thorough training at start-up.

Hourly wage: Up to 185kr
